original_text: But Micaiah said, ‘I can only speak what my God tells me to say. As surely as the Lord lives, that is what I must do.’
korean_text: 미가야가 이르되 여호와께서 살아 계심을 두고 맹세하노니 내 하나님께서 말씀하시는 것 곧 그것을 내가 말하리라 하고

sentences.original_text: what my God tells me to say
sentences.korean_translation: 내 하나님이 나에게 말하라고 하시는 것을

sentences.original_text: As surely as the Lord lives
that is what I must do
